title: So...
body:
Curious as to why OCE still has a cursed ranked queue close time every single day. Firstly, I've played on OCE since 10 minutes after the release of the server, I remember the wait for rank to be implemented etc etc. I can understand the reasoning behind limiting ranked ques at first with a high influx of players at mixed times etc etc. But now... I mean seriously? I play games at various ELO's silver to high plat just before 4am and still get ques within a couple of minutes. Clearly demonstrating that people WILL still play at said times. 

For examples, CS:GO Has 24/7 ranked ques, while being a singular server based game it will only match you with people in your region, sure it's a bit of wait at 4am-5am for a queue but you still get them, League being a much bigger game than CS:GO should have no problems with being able to keep ranked queues open permanently. That's just my piece, thanks.

replies.body:
Because the server population is too low.
This is also why we don't have a permanent queue for Twisted Treeline, or Normal Drafts.
I agree I often play ranked games very late at night/early in the morning and I have no troubles. I am lower ELO.

At 3AM - 4AM I can get into challanger games or I can get into plat 5 games. This is not intended, I am intended to verse other Diamond 5 players. That is why the queues are turned off at 4AM, even though they should in fact be turned off from 3AM - 10AM. Since at 8AM - 10AM I can also get into challanger games or low plat games.
I mean, fair enough if even high ELO was disabled. I can understand the logic behind disabling diamond + game play, but all the lower ELO's? Not so much.
